creator: deancalhoun@netscape.net
text:
I had a problem with the build.xml file contained in the sample documentation.  
The javadoc section has a </javadoc> that was causing problems.  I commented 
out this line, re-ran "ant all" and it worked fine.
Could you be a bit more specific -- what sample build file, where?
creator: holtdl@yahoo.com
